Class Game

java.lang.Object
Engine.Game
public class Game extends Object
Game logics.

    • roomContains

      public boolean roomContains(String itemId)
      Checks if the current room contains an item with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      itemId - item ID
      Returns:
      true if the item is in the current room, otherwise false
